title: compareItems
description: compares two items to determine which item is larger

rows.name: compareProperties
rows.description: compareProperties array of properties that will be used to compare the two items. Set @see CompareProperty.ascending to false for

sections.title: Returns
sections.data: 1 if item1 is larger, -1 if item2 is larger and 0 if they are equal
a descending sort on a property
